General.Name: Edip Gayrimenkul Yatirim Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Edip Gayrimenkul Yatirim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a construction company in Turkey. It constructs shopping Centers and offices. The company was formerly known as Edip Iplik Sanayi veTicaret A.S. and changed its name to Edip Gayrimenkul Yatirim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in June 2009. Edip Gayrimenkul Yatirim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1971 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Mahmutbey Merkez Mah. Tasocagi Cad. No:5, Istanbul, Turkey
